name: Escape Impact
description:
Submission for Tenth Creative Game Jam.

You are a lone engineer, abandoned on a ship in the crossfire of a deadly meteor shower. Can you fix the hyperdrive and escape your doom?

*See WIP Bugs Below

How To Play:

Arrows to move. X/Z to interact. Key prompts will appear often. 

5/7 Themes aimed for.

Trapped, Street Lamp, HyperSpeed, Doors, Space.

*WIP Bugs:

Sometimes you will need to hit the interact buttons more than once to register.

For the combo lock, use the arrow keys to change the numbers

If you have troubles with the puzzles, please let me know. This is the first time I've ever made a game like this before.
